document_data.mainbody:
lack Eel Street was street that crossed the Seatower district in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate.
Black Eel Street began at Baldurs Gates western city wall and moved in a relatively straight line across the Seatower district, passing the beginning of Wendserpent Street, one block west of the water, and ending at Glaezels Dock overlooking the Gray Harbor. Black Eel Street ran parallel to Caundorl Street.
